name: Space Shooter 2D/3D
description:
Welcome to Space Shooter 2D/3D .

In this Space Invaders clone, there are 2 types of gameplay styles. While the general gameplay is the same, the game environment changes between 2D and 3D. 

In Space Shooter 2D/3D, the player controls a ship by moving it horizontally at the bottom of the screen, while also shooting off aliens who are coming closer to the player from the top of the screen. For each alien destroyed, the player earns points. When all enemies are destroyed a fresh wave appears. The game continues until the player runs out of lives. 

Can you set the high score?

Download the demo to give the 3D gameplay a try.
